N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง 1.4 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) Printed
material shall be furnished upon receipt of total payment in cash or by check
or money order payable to "New York State Department of

Transportation."
(b) All other
charges for reproduction of records shall be paid for in the form of cash or by
check or money order payable to "New York State Department of Transportation"
at the time the records are delivered to the requestor. There shall be no fee
charged for the inspection of records and searching for records. (c) Charge for engineering work and other
similar services shall be made based upon the actual cost (salaries, fringe
benefits, overhead) to the department to perform the service. (d) Refunds shall be made, dependent upon the
circumstances, on a case-by-case basis. (e) The department, in response to written
requests, may furnish one or two copies of appropriate maps and other printed
materials free of charge to Federal and other State agencies, members of the

Legislature, the news media, local governments and planning boards, upon
evidence of need for such records. In addition, copies of such materials may be
furnished to nongovernmental organizations employed by public agencies on
specific projects if a valid need is demonstrated. Material in reproducible
form may, at the discretion of the department, be lent to public agencies for
specified purposes, without charge. (f) When certification is requested, the
format will be: The foregoing is a true and complete copy
of____________
____________
the original of which is on file with the Department of

Transportation of the State of New York. Date________
________
(Signature)
________
(Title)

The records access officer or Director, Office of Record, or
other appropriate department official, will sign the
certification. Notes
